services.title: 50% PAYMENT
services.description: AFTER THE BRIEF WE SIGN THE CONTRACT AND ACCEPT HALF OF THE PAYMENT

services.title: DEVELOPMENT
services.description: AFTER THE DESIGN IS APPROVED, OUR DEVELOPERS BEGIN CODE THE WEBSITE AND ENLIVEN IT

services.title: PROTOTYPING
services.description: WE WORK ON DESIGN OF THE WEBSITE THROUGH STEP-BY-STEP ITERATIONS

services.title: CONTENT FILLING
services.description: AS WE FINISH DEVELOPING THE PRODUCT WE HAVE TO FILL IT WITH THE REAL TEXT AND PHOTOS

services.title: TESTING
services.description: AFTER THE WEBSITE IS READY WE TEST IT IN ALL TERMS FROM THE UX TO ITS LOADING SPEED

services.title: DELIVERY
services.description: AFTER THE PRODUCT PASSES ALL THE CHECK UPS WE CAN BRAVELY HAND IT TO YOU
